body: A small group of indigenous intelligent creatures joins your kingdom and submits to your rule. Society and Stability increase by 1, Unrest decreases by 1, and your Treasury increases by 1d6 BP (each time you roll a 6, add the result to the total and roll again).
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Turn Sequence/Events/New Subjects
name: New Subjects
